# AI Study Companion

Welcome to the AI Study Companion repository! This is a comprehensive learning platform that bridges tutoring sessions with an AI companion.

## Quick Links

- [Main README](../README.md) - Full project documentation
- [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [Architecture Docs](../docs/ARCHITECTURE.md) - System architecture
- [Demo Outline](../docs/DEMO_OUTLINE.md) - Product demo guide

## Getting Started

See the [main README](../README.md) for installation and setup instructions.

## Issues

Found a bug or have a feature request? Please use the issue templates:
- [Bug Report](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)
- [Feature Request](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md)

## Pull Requests

Before submitting a PR, please:
1. Read the [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
2. Ensure all tests pass
3. Update documentation if needed
4. Use the [PR Template](.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md)
